LanguageData.LevelUpTextMessageLabelTooltip: Show text message on levelling up.
LanguageData.LevelUpSoundEffectLabelTooltip: Play sound effect when levelling up.
LanguageData.LevelUpAnimationLabelTooltip: Do animation on pawn when levelling up.
LanguageData.LevelDownLabel: Level Down! {0} dropped to level {1} in {2}.
LanguageData.LevelDownTextMessageLabelTooltip: Show text message on levelling down.
LanguageData.LevelDownSoundEffectLabelTooltip: Play sound effect when levelling down.
LanguageData.LevelDownAnimationLabelTooltip: Do animation on pawn when levelling down.
